page.title: 07LANGUAGE
page.content: The fermer an' his cuddie. Ance there wis a fermer cad Jock. Noo Jock wis gan aroon his parks ane day fin he sa' his cuddie lookin' afa sad. Jock speart fit wis wrang. The cuddie said "A'm sad cos a've got naebody tae keep ma company". Noo Jock said tae his cuddie."A'm gan tae a roup the morn so a'll try an' get anither cuddie". Translation. The farmer and his horse. Once there was a farmer called John. Now John was going around his fields one day when he saw his horse looking very sad. John asked what was wrong.The horse said "I'm sad because I've got nobody to keep me company". Now John said to his horse, "I'm going to an auction tomorrow so I'll try to get another horse".
